name: QuestionoftheDay
0:
”Alexa, play Question of the Day”
”Alexa, open Question of the Day”
”Alexa, ask Question of the Day”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: question of the day
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The game works like this: each day you get a trivia question from Alexa, from one of six categories. The categories are randomly chosen, so your craving cranium can feast on a variety of fascinating facts. You can earn bonus questions, collect points, and compete against other fans. Here's your first fun fact: Did you know Question of the Day was awarded the 2020 Gaming Voice Experience of the Year by Project Voice and has been featured in USA TODAY, CNBC, CNET, and more? Start playing this award-winning game by saying, 'Alexa, open Question of the Day!'

 IS QUESTION OF THE DAY FREE?
 Yes! Anyone can play Question of the Day, earn bonus questions, collect points, and get other personal stats at no cost. Subscribers to Question of the Day will receive the Question of the Day PLUS three daily challenge questions, rankings on regional and national leaderboards, and unlimited access to our archives for a monthly fee. But the daily game is completely free for everyone. Here's your second fun fact: Did you know 1 Question of the Day + 3 challenge questions + ∞ archived questions = brainy bliss?
 
 FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
 Our website, askqotd.com, features an FAQ section and blog articles with more compelling content related to our questions. We hope you find Question of the Day to be a delightful experience! Here's your third fun fact: Did you know you can give feedback or suggestions on how to make the game more enjoyable? Please contact us at support@volleythat.com.
